definition[0]: a tool with a rounded blade and a long handle used for moving earth, stones etc
definition[1]: a part of a large vehicle or machine used for moving or digging earth
definition[2]: to lift and move earth, stones etc with a shovel
example[0]: The workmen shovelled gravel onto the road.
example[1]: They were out in freezing conditions shovelling snow off the pitch.
example[2]: Everyone was out shoveling their sidewalks.
